full_description: We are looking to fill numerous positions in the video game testing/esports department for the US Navy. There is up to a $25,000 signing bonus for exceptionally qualified applicants. The ideal candidate will:-Be between 17-39 years old-Not have any felony convictions-Be a US Citizen or Permanent Resident-Be able to pass a basic math and English aptitude test-Be in Gilroy or the local area-Have a High School Diploma or GED-Be able to pass a drug test, and a background check as applicable by Federal, State, and Local laws-Be willing to relocate if requiredThe US NAVY is branching out into ESports, Video Gaming, Social Media, and Video Game Testing and we are looking for you! Ever wanted to get paid to play video games? Ever wanted to travel the world and be a brand ambassador?
